comment: We all love travelling .. But i love a little more , cuz you get to meet and talk with alot of fellow passengers and spread love .. Today i met a kid with autism and his grandfather who takes ultimate care for the kid .. Our fellow passenger had this wimdow seat and the grandfather <URL>

comment: Requested this seat for the kid so that he'll be calm and focused on the scenic view but then this year old fellow passenger didn't even adjust a bit , he behaved inhumane i just wokeup from my sleep and gave my window seat for the beautiful kid i request you everyone
